author: Darrell Etherington
title: FDA debuts new online portal to encourage donation of plasma from recovered COVID-19 patients
description: One of the avenues currently being pursued in terms of developing an effective treatment for COVID-19 is through the use of convalescent plasma. Basically, that means using the liquid component of blood from people who have had, and already recovered fully fr…
